  • Method Details

    • create

      @PostMapping org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MODEL> create(@RequestBody DTO entity)
      Create a new resource
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to create
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the created resource

    • getAll

      @GetMapping org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MODEL>> getAll()
      Retrieve all resources
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing list of all resources

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MODEL> getById(@PathVariable ID id)
      Retrieve a resource by its ID
      Parameters:
      id - the resource ID
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the found resource

    • update

      @PutMapping("/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MODEL> update(@PathVariable ID id, @RequestBody MODEL entity)
      Update an existing resource
      Parameters:
      id - the resource ID
      entity - the updated resource data
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated resource

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> delete(@PathVariable ID id)
      Delete a resource by its ID
      Parameters:
      id - the resource ID
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with no content

    • search

      @GetMapping("/search") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<MODEL>> search(@RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(required=false) String sort)
      Retrieve paginated and sorted resources
      Parameters:
      page - page number (optional)
      size - items per page (optional)
      sort - sort criteria (optional)
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing page of resources
